properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine contains " -i:" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /i:") and FolderPath endswith "\\regsvr32.exe") and (not(ProcessCommandLine contains " -n " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /n "))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a potential command line flag anomaly related to "regsvr32" in which the "/i" flag is used without the "/n" which should be uncommon.
